comment: Amber Heard WEAPONIZED "Cancel Culture" in order to destroy Mr. Depp. BEFORE ANY ACCUSATIONS, Ms. Heard had her lawyer send Mr. Depp a letter demanding: $50,000 per month support, the Range Rover (Mr. Depp to cover all costs), three Penthouse Apartments worth $13,000,000 (Mr. Depp to cover utilities and fees), $100,000 lawyer fees, $25,000 forensic accounting, and an undisclosed Divorce settlement. WHEN Mr. Depp refused, THEN she accused him of abuse. She SOLD her "evidence" to the tabloids for cash, but when she was required to turn it over to the court for disclosure and testing--SHE DROPPED HER ALLEGATIONS. The Judge dismissed Ms. Heard's abuse case WITH PREJUDICE. It means that Ms. Heard cannot bring another abuse case against Mr. Depp. Ms. Heard used the case to destroy Mr. Depp WITH NO EVIDENCE. Mr. Depp has waited over three years, until Ms. Heard gave him a legal avenue to FORCE her into court with her "evidence" against his evidence, which by the list, is formidable. The case is defamation, but the crimes that Ms. Heard committed in attempting to frame Mr. Depp are: fabricating "evidence" and selling it for personal gain, tampering with "evidence" and selling it for personal gain, making a video of Mr. Depp without his knowledge or consent, and selling it for personal gain, tampering with witnesses, extortion, Domestic Abuse causing bodily harm, perjury in the abuse deposition, perjury in the divorce deposition, perjury in the defamation deposition, and defamation. Can you imagine waiting for years, watching your ABUSER be rewarded with movies (Yes, I mean you, Aquaman), receive lucrative contracts (Yes, I mean you L'Oreal), and held up as an hero (Yes, I mean you, United Nations), knowing you almost died (the multiple surgeries to his finger resulted in 3 serious MRSA infections) as a result of her abuse? You can't make a movie when you are in jail. She should be going to jail for a good, long time.
